sniffitysmobs.bloodthirst.message.3: As the Villager takes damage, you feel an ominous presence becoming stronger...
sniffitysmobs.bloodthirst.message.7: Be careful... Something is watching... You can feel it closer now... Stronger, even...
item.sniffitysmobs.silver_needle.text.1: Used to check for hidden monsters...
item.sniffitysmobs.silver_needle.text.2: A simple prick will coerce the creature into revealing itself...
